price: Nítorí náà, ní ọjọ́ yẹn Wọn kò níí bi ènìyàn àti àlùjànnú kan léèrè nípa ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ rẹ̀; (ó ti wà ní àkọsílẹ̀ ní ọ̀dọ̀ Wa).
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
